description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
No horizontal structure so structure percent is 100
Count layers up to max_layer_number which is set by the createMappingsView() function in the workflow.
Maps source value to CROWN_CLOSURE_UPPER using lists of values
Maps source value to CROWN_CLOSURE_LOWER using lists of values
Correct translation has not been determined.
Maps source value to SPECIES_1 using lookup table
Maps source value to SPECIES_2 using lookup table
Maps source value to SPECIES_3 using lookup table
Maps source value to SPECIES_4 using lookup table
Maps source value to SPECIES_5 using lookup table
